participant_1.background:
I have a busy life and tend to neglect my family, but I'm making an effort to do better.
My family works to support my dreams.
i have never been on an airplane.
When I'm not volunteering with my son's Boy Scout troop, I love to challenge myself by dancing.
I have always been close to my family, even though we are not always in agreement.

participant_2.background:
I wake up early to get a head start on my day, and I make sure to schedule time for soccer practice and spending time with my kids.
I'm not as open about my interests as I would like to be, but I love baseball and fishing.
i had two cats growing up.
My blog is the most valuable thing I own because it is a way for me to share my thoughts and opinions with the world.
I keep to myself because I am afraid of being judged.

content.text: Hi, I am from New York. What about you?
Hello, I am from California.
What do you do for a living?
I am a writer and I also run a blog.
That sounds interesting. What do you like to write about?
I like to write about my personal experiences and my thoughts on current events.
That is cool. I like to read. What is your favorite type of book to write?
I like to write fiction and nonfiction.
I like to read fiction. What is your favorite fiction book?
My favorite fiction book is To Kill a Mockingbird.
I love that book. I have read it several times.
It is a great book. What is your favorite nonfiction book?
My favorite nonfiction book is The Autobiography of Malcolm X.
That is a great book. I have read it too.
It is a very inspiring book. I like to read books that inspire me.
I like to read books that make me think.
Me too. I like to learn new things.
I like to learn new things too.
Do you have any pets?
I have two dogs.
I love dogs. I have a dog named Max.
Max is a great name for a dog.
Thank you. I think so too.
